name: Diverge
description:
My submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

The assigned theme was "Out of Control." Accordingly, DIVERGE is a simple puzzle game that relies on setting up the perfect shot to advance. Hit all totems with a single shot to win! 

This game was designed and built in 48 hours. I created most of the art assets independently, but audio and some UI sprites were pulled from freeware. 

You can play DIVERGE here, via web browser - no downloads necessary: https://strayderps.itch.io/diverge

Twitter: https://twitter.com/stray_derps

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtiDkBjvo2LnnQ_ENVfFehA
